   <class>com.fiorano.adapter.jca.xslt.cci.XsltInteractionSpec</class>

  <void property="beanObject"> 
   <void property="XSL"> 
    <string>&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot;?&gt;
&lt;xsl:stylesheet version=&quot;2.0&quot; 
    xmlns:xsl=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform&quot;
    xmlns:cam=&quot;http://middleware.network.dhl.com/schema/CAM&quot;
    xmlns:hdr=&quot;http://middleware.network.dhl.com/schema/Envelope&quot;
    xmlns:xsi=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&quot; 
    xsi:schemaLocation=&quot;http://middleware.network.dhl.com/schema/CAM CAM.xsd
    http://middleware.network.dhl.com/schema/Envelope Envelope.xsd&quot;
    &gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:output method=&quot;text&quot; indent=&quot;no&quot;/&gt;
    &lt;xsl:strip-space elements=&quot;*&quot;/&gt;
    &lt;!--&lt;xsl:include href=&quot;pad.xsl&quot;/&gt;--&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template match=&quot;/&quot; &gt;
        &lt;xsl:apply-templates /&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;!--&lt;xsl:template match=&quot;//hdr:message/cam:CAM//assignedCrew/cockpitCrewMember&quot;&gt;--&gt;
    &lt;xsl:template match=&quot;//assignedCrew/cockpitCrewMember&quot;&gt;
        &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;do-leg&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(substring(normalize-space(./crewEmployer),1,2),&apos;  &apos;),1,2)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;substring(normalize-space(./crewEmployer),1,2)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;2&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(substring(normalize-space(./crewMemberId),1,8),&apos;        &apos;),1,8)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;substring(normalize-space(./crewMemberId),1,8)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;8&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(substring(normalize-space(./crewMemberName),1,30),&apos;                              &apos;),1,30)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;substring(normalize-space(./crewMemberName),1,30)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;30&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(substring(normalize-space(./rank),1,2),&apos;  &apos;),1,2)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;substring(normalize-space(./rank),1,2)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;2&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;./addCrewMemberBool = &apos;true&apos;&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:text&gt;Y&lt;/xsl:text&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:text&gt;N&lt;/xsl:text&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
        
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;qcount&quot; select=&quot;count(./additionalQualifications/additionalQualification)&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$qcount &amp;gt; 0&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;do-quals&quot; &gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$qcount&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;                       &apos;&quot;&gt;&lt;/xsl:value-of&gt;
                &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;output-spaces&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;23&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
        
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(normalize-space(./training),&apos; &apos;),1,1)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;normalize-space(./training)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;1&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;./dutyStart/startDateTime&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(./dutyStart/startDateTime,9,2)&quot; /&gt;  
                &lt;xsl:text&gt;/&lt;/xsl:text&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(./dutyStart/startDateTime,6,2)&quot; /&gt;   
                &lt;xsl:text&gt;/&lt;/xsl:text&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(./dutyStart/startDateTime,1,4)&quot; /&gt;   
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(./dutyStart/startDateTime,11,6)&quot; /&gt;   
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;                &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;output-spaces&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;16&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
        
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;./dutyStart/airport&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(normalize-space(./dutyStart/airport),&apos;   &apos;),1,3)&quot; /&gt;   
                &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;normalize-space(./dutyStart/airport)&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;3&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;   &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;output-spaces&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;3&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;

        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;ccount&quot; select=&quot;count(./catCQualifiedAirports/catCQualifiedAirport)&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$ccount &amp;gt; 0&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;do-cats&quot; &gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$ccount&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;                                                           &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;output-spaces&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;59&quot; /&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
        
        &lt;xsl:text&gt;&amp;#10;&lt;/xsl:text&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;do-leg&quot;&gt;
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;leg&quot; select=&quot;//hdr:message/cam:CAM/crewAssignments/crewAssignment/legIdentifier/legId&quot; /&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;leg&quot; select=&quot;//crewAssignments/crewAssignment/legIdentifier/legId&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(normalize-space($leg/flight/fnCarrier),&apos;   &apos;),1,3)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;normalize-space($leg/flight/fnCarrier)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;3&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(normalize-space($leg/flight/fnNumber),&apos;    &apos;),1,4)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;normalize-space($leg/flight/fnNumber)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;4&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring(concat(normalize-space($leg/flight/fnSuffix),&apos; &apos;),1,1)&quot; /&gt;   
        &lt;!--&lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;normalize-space($leg/flight/fnSuffix)&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;1&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;--&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of
            select=&quot;substring(normalize-space($leg/scheduledDepartureDateUTC),9,2)&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;/&apos;&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of
            select=&quot;substring(normalize-space($leg/scheduledDepartureDateUTC),6,2)&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;&apos;/&apos;&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of
            select=&quot;substring(normalize-space($leg/scheduledDepartureDateUTC),1,4)&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;normalize-space($leg/depApSched)&quot; /&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;     
    
    &lt;!--
        set value to empty
        set index to 1
        set count to num_quals
        set parent to additoinalQuals
        call add-qual(value,index,count,parent)
        
        add-qual:
        if index &lt; count:
        add comma to vlaue
        add parent/child[index] to value
        call add-qual(value,index+1,count,parent)
        else
        pad value to 23
    --&gt;
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;do-quals&quot;&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;count&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;&apos;&apos;&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;1&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;./additionalQualifications&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-qual&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;$value&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;add-qual&quot;&gt;    
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;value&quot;/&gt; 
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;index&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;count&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;parent&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$index = 1&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-qual&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;concat($value,$parent/additionalQualification[$index])&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index + 1&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$index &amp;lt; $count&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-qual&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;concat(concat($value,&apos;,&apos;),$parent/additionalQualification[$index])&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index + 1&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;$value&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;23&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;

    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;do-cats&quot;&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;count&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;&apos;&apos;&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;1&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;./catCQualifiedAirports&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-cat&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;$value&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;add-cat&quot;&gt;    
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;value&quot;/&gt; 
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;index&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;count&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;parent&quot; /&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$index = 1&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-cat&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;concat($value,$parent/catCQualifiedAirport[$index])&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index + 1&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;$index &amp;lt; $count&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;add-cat&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;value&quot; select=&quot;concat(concat($value,&apos;,&apos;),$parent/catCQualifiedAirport[$index])&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;index&quot; select=&quot;$index + 1&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;count&quot; select=&quot;$count&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;parent&quot; select=&quot;$parent&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;&apos; &apos;&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;$value&quot; /&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;&apos;59&apos;&quot; /&gt;            
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template match=&quot;@*|node()&quot;&gt;
        &lt;xsl:apply-templates /&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;output-spaces&quot;&gt;    
        &lt;!-- recursive template to output the specified nr of spaces --&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;length&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:variable name=&quot;spaces&quot; select=&quot;&apos;&apos;&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;do-output-spaces&quot;&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;output&quot; select=&quot;$spaces&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;$length&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;do-output-spaces&quot; &gt;
    &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;output&quot;/&gt;
    &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;length&quot;/&gt;
     &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;string-length($output) &amp;lt; number($length)&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;do-output-spaces&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;output&quot; select=&quot;concat(&apos; &apos;,$output)&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;$length&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring($output,string-length($output) - number($length) + 1)&quot;/&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;prepend-pad&quot;&gt;    
        &lt;!-- recursive template to right justify and prepend--&gt;
        &lt;!-- the value with whatever pad-char is passed in   --&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;pad-char&quot;/&gt; 
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;pad-var&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;length&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;string-length($pad-var) &amp;lt; number($length)&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;prepend-pad&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;$pad-char&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;concat($pad-char,$pad-var)&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;$length&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring($pad-var,string-length($pad-var) - number($length) + 1)&quot;/&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
    
    
    &lt;xsl:template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;    
        &lt;!-- recursive template to left justify and append  --&gt;
        &lt;!-- the value with whatever pad-char is passed in   --&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;pad-char&quot;/&gt; 
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;pad-var&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:param name=&quot;length&quot;/&gt;
        &lt;xsl:choose&gt;
            &lt;xsl:when test=&quot;string-length($pad-var) &amp;lt; number($length)&quot;&gt;
                &lt;xsl:call-template name=&quot;append-pad&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-char&quot; select=&quot;$pad-char&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;pad-var&quot; select=&quot;concat($pad-var,$pad-char)&quot;/&gt;
                    &lt;xsl:with-param name=&quot;length&quot; select=&quot;$length&quot;/&gt;
                &lt;/xsl:call-template&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:when&gt;
            &lt;xsl:otherwise&gt;
                &lt;xsl:value-of select=&quot;substring($pad-var,1,number($length))&quot;/&gt;
            &lt;/xsl:otherwise&gt;
        &lt;/xsl:choose&gt;
    &lt;/xsl:template&gt;
&lt;/xsl:stylesheet&gt;</string> 
   </void>
